presentation
Interface PresentationElement

All Known Implementing Classes:
BezierEdge, BezierHandler, CircleNode, Edge, EdgeHandler, FSAGraph, GraphElement, GraphLabel, InitialArrow, InitialArrow.Handler, Node, ReflexiveEdge, ReflexiveEdge.ReflexiveHandler, SelectionGroup
public interface PresentationElement

Interface for any element that can be displayed in the drawing area. Adheres to the Composite (recursive composition) design pattern.

Author:
Helen Bretzke March 2006
